features: ✪CHOICE FOR BETTER LIFE-The Cord, Socket and Plug of Aooshine bedside table lamp are UL listed. By giving products the listed, you don’t have to worry about the material problem. This Nightstand lamp comes with ON/OFF switch control, easy to install and use. Please note not included bulb. Please use the LED bulb only.

✪MINIMALIST DESIGN-The elegant sleek look of this table lamp elevates the aesthetic of your home, an open-top cloth shade of beige linen hovers over a petite black base. The size and the design make this accent lamp a splendid accoutrement for guest cottages and professional offices alike.

✪Comfortable Glow-Our small desk Lamp creates a nice and comforting feeling in the house when spending time with your family as the linen fabric shade softens the light. Lamps for nightstand is Not Dimmable.

✪VERSATILE-With E26 universal standard base(Bulb not included), this minimalist rectangle table lamp is best for bedroom, living room, baby room, office, coffee table, college dorm, cafe, bookcase in your library or den. This night stand lights is also a great gift for your family and friend.(Please use the LED bulb, max watt of the LED bulb is 20W)
✪BUY WITH CONFIDENCE-Having adhered the most demanding quality control procedures. Any problems, please tell us directly, and we will provide best service as we can.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Small Minimalist Table Lamp for Bedroom with Square Fabric Shade for Nightstand The elegant and sleek look of this table lamp decorate your home warmly and fragrantly. The size and the design make this lamp a splendid accoutrement for guest cottages and professional offices alike.
E26 Universal Standard Base (Bulb Not Included) Please note the bulb is not included, recommend E26/E27 LED light bulb. Voltage: AC86-265V; Power Up State: US Plug; Bulb Wattage: Max 60W.

Design to be soft, stable and non-flickering, the corner desk lamp with rectangular shade is friendly on your eyes so you can enjoy what you’re doing for longer. And this product has been tested by UL to nationally recognized safety and sustainability standards.

Size (L/W/H) Please note the size before order Shade:4.1*4.1*9.3in Overall: 4.1*4.1*13.2in The distance between the base and switch: 14.2in Cord Length: 59in, the switch is located in the cord Perfect Decor & Gift A surprise gift for your family and friends A handsome accent lighting for any modern or craftsman style home. Square black base and fabric shade provide a natural feeling. Clean, linear and minimalist design, ideal as a Birthday Present. Easy To Use Easy to install the small lamp, please take off the fixing ring first. There is an ON/OFF Switch with US plug that makes it super convenient as a bedside table lamp. Place on top of a nightstand, desk, or console table for illumination in sophisticated style.

DIY Lampshade for Gift or Home Decor (Sticker not included) It's very interesting to DIY your lamp by drawing or sticking something special, you can take this wonderful lamp as a gift for your family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect size
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is perfect for my bathroom. It gives off a lot of light to be small and shade is pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, sleek, works great with smart bulb
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an inexpensive small simple no-frills lamp that uses regular A19/E26 bulbs for my bedroom. It's surprising how hard it is to find the intersection of this ven diagram in big box stores. This lamp was perfect- Minimalist design, simple switch, easy to replace bulbs, very small footprint. I paired it with a smart bulb and now I have an amazing dimmable mood lamp for the bedroom with all of the colors of the rainbow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a small lamp for my work desk. This is just right! I have it pictured with a mug and TV remote for perspective. I also like the in-line switch. The price is great! I initially checked at a 2nd-hand store for a basic little lamp, thinking it wouldn't cost much, but the ones I saw were still almost the same price as this new one. The lamp is well-made and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Small Table Lamp for Bedroom is a nice and minimalist solid wood nightstand lamp, and I recently purchased it to enhance the atmosphere of my bedroom. I have to admit that I am extremely delighted with my purchase, and you can take that to the bank.Elegant Minimalism The lamp's design is one of its most appealing aspects, and one of those features is its minimalist aesthetic. Because the base is made of solid wood, it emanates a feeling of elegance while still maintaining a sense of simplicity, which makes it a seamless fit for a range of different bedroom decor types. It does not take up an excessive amount of room, which is precisely what I was searching for.Lighting That Is Both Warm and Inviting: The lamp emits a glow that is both warm and inviting, making it an excellent choice for lighting the bedroom so that it exudes an air of coziness. The gentle illumination is perfect for unwinding at the end of the day or for doing some light reading before going to bed. The fact that it is not excessively bright is a significant advantage when used in a setting like a bedroom.Simple to Operate: The process of turning on and off the light is uncomplicated. Because it comes with a practical on/off switch and the connector is a common size, setting it up does not require any complicated configuration. You only need to plug it in, turn it on, and then you can bask in the warm and inviting light.Strong and Well-Constructed: The lamp's base is made of solid wood, which lends an air of sturdiness and quality to the piece. The fact that it is both robust and well-constructed contributes to the overall appeal of the product. I admire the high standard of the components that were utilized in its creation.The lamp has a small footprint, making it an excellent choice for placement on a nightstand, and it does not occupy a significant amount of room. It is an ideal option for those with smaller bedrooms or those who have a bedside table with a restricted amount of space.Versatile and kind to one's taste in decoration:This lamp will simply mix in with your bedroom's decor, regardless of whether it is modern, rustic, or classic. Because of both its color and its design, it is easily adapted to a variety of different kinds of interior decorating.The one and only reason I didn't give it a perfect five stars is because I wish it had a dimmer function so I could alter the brightness to suit my various moods and requirements. Nevertheless, both in terms of its cost and the way it is designed in general, it is an excellent addition to my bedroom.In conclusion, the Small Table Lamp for Bedroom - Bedside Lamps for Nightstand is a chic, space-saving, and well-constructed lamp that gives your bedroom decor a touch of elegance and is perfect for nightstands and bedside tables alike. The lighting is soft and inviting, making for an environment that is conducive to relaxation. Even if it may benefit from a dimming option, it is still a good pick for anyone looking for a bedside lamp that is minimalist and functional. I am pleased with my purchase and would suggest it to other people who are looking for a lighting solution that is discreet yet beautiful for their bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very simple, useful, space saving lamp
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 3 of these and installed smart bulbs to set on a timer, add color and dim the brightness. I am using them at night to discourage my mother with dementia from turning on overhead, ceiling lights and leaving them on all night. So far, they are working perfectly. They have a small footprint so can be located almost anywhere and their simple, uncluttered design makes them unobtrusive. My only complaint is with Amazon and not the product. Out of the 3 purchased, I clearly received 2 that had been returned. One was reasonably repacked, but had a small defect in the finish on the front of the base. The other was absolutely shoved back into the box and had a bad kink in the cord because of that. I could have simply returned them for replacement but opted to keep them to reduce waste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice lamp. Perfect desk size. Great light. Great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing deal for super sassy lamp
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is so much more cool than the price indicates. I put it on my bookshelf as a third lamp in the room, and it casts a nice warm glow because of the nice fabric shade. Sharp, modern angles give it some sophistication. I have an LED equivalent of a 40 watt bulb in there and it gives of a lot of light. I think I will throw this in my go bag if there's an emergency. (Just kidding) but I love this little lamp!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for bathrooms or dark kitchen counter nooks.
reviews.reviewText: I definitely prefer this on-off switch style over their tap nightstand lamps because it works better with Alexa bulbs. Overall, great value, super bright, and space saving.

This is perfect for the space I needed it for. Adds a lovely soft light to that area. This package was late on delivery due to the carrier’s staff shortage due to Covid but it was worth the wait. The seller demonstrated excellent customer service
Buen producto , el precio podía ser más competitivo
La lampara es muy pequeña, no sirve para iluminas una habitación, es meramente decorativa. Por lo tanto, el precio resulta elevado.
